mapper.insert: INSERT INTO data_inout VALUES ( NULL, #{itemId}, #{inoutQuantity}, #{outAreaId}, #{inAreaId}, #{inoutDatetime}, 'user', 0, NOW(), 'user', NOW(), 'user' )
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT di.inout_id as inoutId, di.item_id as itemId, di.inout_quantity as inoutQuantity, di.out_area_id as outAreaId, mao.area as outArea, di.in_area_id as inAreaId, mai.area as inArea, di.inout_datetime as inoutDatetime, di.register_datetime as RegisterDatetime, di.inout_user_id as inoutUserId, mu.user_name as inoutUser, di.delete_flg as deleteFlg FROM data_inout di LEFT JOIN master_area mao ON di.out_area_id = mao.area_id LEFT JOIN master_area mai ON di.in_area_id = mai.area_id LEFT JOIN master_user mu ON di.inout_user_id = mu.user_id WHERE di.delete_flg = 0 AND di.item_id = #{itemId} ORDER BY di.inout_datetime DESC
